text: 12.100 In order to implement Part 1(b) and meet standards in the Housing Supplementary Planning Guidance (2016), 10% of all new units across all tenures should be wheelchair user dwellings, but this may be varied to at least 10% of habitable rooms where a better outcome is provided in terms of delivery of larger units. All ‘wheelchair user dwellings’ (the M4 (3) standard) in the affordable rented tenure should meet the M4 (3) (2) (b) standard which meets the needs of occupants who use wheelchairs. 100 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES
